Forest Clearing.description: You stand in a clearing surrounded by dense trees. A white house with a boarded front door is to the north.

House Front.description: You face the southern side of a white house. The front door is boarded shut, but a path leads around to the east.

House East.description: You're at the east side of the white house. A small window is slightly ajar.

House North.description: You're behind the white house. A trail leads into dark woods.

Forest Path.description: A narrow path winds through the trees. You hear a faint sound of water to the east.

Winding Trail.description: The trail meanders through the forest. Thick underbrush blocks most directions.

Thick Woods.description: The woods here are very dense. You can barely make out a clearing to the east.

Babbling Brook.description: A small stream gurgles through the forest. The water looks cool and refreshing.

Small Glade.description: You've entered a peaceful glade. Sunlight filters through the canopy above.

Dark Woods.description: The forest here is dark and foreboding. You feel uneasy.

Garden Path.description: A overgrown garden path runs along the east side of the house.
